content.query:
use FnO
go

create or alter view raw.vw_dItemGroup as 
  select ig.RecId as [Key]
        ,ig.ItemGroupId
	      ,ig.Name as ItemGroup
    from raw.InventItemGroup ig
go

-- Need to delete the storage in data lake
drop external table dw.dItemGroup
go

create external table dw.dItemGroup with (
    location = 'DataWarehouse/dItemGroup'
   ,data_source = ParquetStorage
   ,file_format = ParquetFormat
) as 
    select * from raw.vw_dItemGroup
go

-- select * from raw.vw_dItemGroup
-- select * from dw.dItemGroup
